name: BeyBread
description:
"BeyBread" is a battle game where you fight with a hamburger as a spinning top. You win if enemy lose the HP, keep spinning longer than the enemy, or flick it off the field.

○ Control

Move: W, A, S, D

Skill: Space, E

○ Skill

You can use skills that can advance the battle situation in an advantageous way, such as shock waves and recovery of HP.

○ Edit

If you win the battle, you can get "parts" such as tomatoes and patties.

You can change the appearance, performance, and skill of the burger with the acquired parts.
